resources.string: Requires a config change(display size, navbar position, reboot) themes may overwrite
Option to enable or disable the navigation bar
Switch the back and recent buttons with each other
Changes the navigation bar color based on the foreground app in use
Show the clear all button when using recents
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Apply a custom icon pack for Recents panel
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Show the brightness slider underneath quick settings
Show buttons on each side of the slider that increase/decrease by 5%
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
Press on color below to apply
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Hide power menu on lock screen
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Select certian apps to hide in recents
Battery options and statusbar icons to disable
Edit the navigation bar layout and buttons
Manage lockscreen shortcuts down at the bottom
Advanced notifications control on long press
Volume down for do not disturb
allow volume down to enter do not disturb mode
Volume up in do not disturb
allow volume up to exit do not disturb mode
Show do not disturb swith on volume panel
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Add, remove, and position items in the sidebar
Position the sidebar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the sidebar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Enable adjustment of max lockscreen notifications
Change the shortcuts right under the lockscreen clock
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Change the view of the recents screen
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back key
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Select what to show when you press the power button
When restarting also show options for recovery and bootloader
Alpha value of the On-The-Go overlay.
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Enable to show weather and temp on the lockscreen
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Display negociated charger max current and voltage on lockscreen
Disable to remove ripple when entering pin numbers
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing.
Display a warning at bottom of notification panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Post all notification from these applications to heads up
Already added this application to the list
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Allow locksreen to roate when moving phone
Display a notification when android debugging is enabled
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Enable orange system bars when battery saver is in use
Change the look of the icon in the statusbar
For better visibility on bright images
Select a local or remote image
Change how much you can see through the quick settings panel
Show weather temp and or image on the status bar
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Force the volume keys to always control media stream
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Disabling this will make fingerprint sensor only work when screen is on
Show weather information on the bottom of ambient display
Change the date\'s visibility underneath the clock widget
Change the alarm text\'s visibility underneath the clock widget
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Block system wakelocks. Use with caution
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevent burn-in by shifting pixels every
When enabled the statusbar will be hidden on lockscreen
Allow hiding quick settings header carrier text
Show a notification when the battery is fully charged
This will hide all force close notificaitons. Use with caution
